transArray.content: The hotel service staff have a very good attitude. There are dedicated people who will check your temperature and register when entering and leaving the hotel. The room is clean and sanitary, so you can stay at ease. There is also a self-service laundry room on the first floor with a washing machine and dryer, which is very convenient. The transportation is also very convenient, and it is also very close to the subway. It is a great staying experience.

Dear guest, thank you for staying at Beijing Chaoyang Park Qiaodong Branch and giving us a favorable review. The hotel belongs to the Hanting 2.7 version. The products are very new and clean. It is also very close to Chaoyang Joy City. You can shop and eat there. It is very convenient. There is a free parking lot and laundry room. I hope this hotel will become your first choice in Beijing. We sincerely look forward to your visit again!
